Home.exploreTitle: Smart, AI-Powered Vending Machines for Every Need
Home.exploreSubTitle: Our machines go beyond classic vending ‚Äì they‚Äôre smart, AI-powered food solutions. From pizza to beer, each unit analyzes sales in real time, spots trends, and optimizes offerings. AI manages temperature, refills, and customer experience for maximum efficiency and minimal costs.
Home.ourClientsSubTitle: Partnering with businesses of all sizes. We provide customized vending solutions to meet your unique requirements.
Home.serveSubTitle: Our AI-controlled vending machines adapt individually to your requirements. Whether hotel, university or factory floor - the artificial intelligence analyses consumption patterns, automatically adjusts the product range and minimizes downtime. Perfect for busy locations or decentralized sites.
Home.sustainabilityText: With AI, we optimize not just sales processes but also ecological cycles. Our return machines automatically recognize container types and digitalize deposit processes. AI analyzes consumption to prevent food waste. Simultaneously, we collaborate with regional partners on innovative reusable systems ‚Äì made in Saxony.
Home.CloudSystem: Cloud System Powered by Android, AWS, NAYAX
Home.CloudSystemTitle: Take Control of Your Vending Network
Home.CloudSystemSubTitle: Manage your vending machines globally, adjust pricing on the fly, and track key performance indicators‚Äîall from a single, user-friendly dashboard.
Home.naftext3: ‚Äì with the vision of creating real alternatives to traditional Gastronomy. With roots in fine dining and a passion for technology, we combine culinary delight with digitalization. Our AI systems are developed in-house by an international team of IT talents and Gastronomy professionals, under the leadership of our CTO,
Home.naftext4: , who spearheads innovation in AI-driven culinary solutions and technological advancements.

blogPost.blogPostTitle: How UI/UX Design Can Boost Your Vending Machine Sales
blogPost.blogPostContent: In today's fast-paced world, convenience is king. As consumers increasingly seek quick and seamless purchasing experiences, vending machines are becoming more popular than ever. However, the true potential of vending machines is often untapped due to poor user interfaces (UI) and user experiences (UX). Investing in excellent UI/UX design can significantly enhance customer satisfaction and drive sales. Here, we explore how thoughtful design can transform your vending machine business.
blogPost.tableContent1text: One of the most significant ways UI design affects vending machine sales is through an intuitive interface. A confusing layout or unclear instructions can frustrate users, leading them to abandon their purchase. A well-designed UI simplifies the process, making it easy for customers to understand how to make selections, complete payments, and receive their products. Simple elements like a responsive touchscreen with clear buttons and prompts can drastically improve user interaction.
blogPost.tableContent2text: First impressions count, and the visual design of a vending machine plays a crucial role in attracting potential customers. A modern, sleek appearance can draw attention, especially if it aligns with your brand's identity. Vibrant colors, cohesive branding, and high-quality graphics can create a machine that captivates and retains customers' interest. Well-placed promotional content on the display can also entice users with special offers or new product lines.
blogPost.tableContent3text: Beyond aesthetics, a seamless user experience is paramount. The process should be fast and straightforward from start to finish, minimizing friction at every step. This involves optimizing the layout for quick navigation, offering multiple payment options, and ensuring quick product dispensation. Consider adding feedback mechanisms, such as thank-you messages or receipt options, to leave a positive impression.
blogPost.tableContent4text: Incorporating accessibility into your vending machine design is not only a moral and legal obligation but also a strategic advantage. By designing for inclusivity, you ensure that all potential customers, including those with disabilities, can use your machines with ease. Features like height-adjustable interfaces, voice commands, Braille instructions, or larger text can make a significant difference.
blogPost.tableContent5text: Modern consumers appreciate personalized experiences. Advanced vending machines can incorporate AI and data analytics to adapt their offerings based on user preferences and past purchase history. Employing these technologies within your UI/UX design can provide a customized experience, increasing the likelihood of repeat customers. Additionally, adaptability in the interface allows for easy integration of new products and features as trends evolve.
blogPost.tableContent6text: Security features in vending machines are vital for building trust. A robust UX includes demonstrating the safety of transactions, particularly with digital payments. Display security credentials prominently and provide an option for digital receipts. Ensuring customers that their data is secure builds confidence and encourages usage.
blogPost.tableContent7text: Investing in UI/UX design for vending machines isn't just about creating a visually appealing product‚Äîit's about enhancing the overall customer experience. By prioritizing intuitive design, engaging visuals, seamless interactions, inclusivity, personalization, and security, you can significantly increase customer satisfaction and, consequently, boost your vending machine sales. As consumer expectations continue to rise, leveraging impactful design becomes essential in staying competitive and driving growth in the vending industry.

about.heroSubTitleline: A prominent provider of innovative vending machine solutions, committed to delivering cutting-edge products and services that meet the evolving needs of consumers and businesses.
about.AboutText1: NAF Germany was founded in 2024 with a vision to revolutionize the vending experience. We saw an opportunity to combine innovative technology with reliable hardware to create vending solutions that truly meet the needs of modern businesses.
about.AboutText2: Since then, we've been committed to pushing the boundaries of vending technology, developing cutting-edge features and designs that set us apart from the competition.
about.AboutText3: From our early beginnings, we've always prioritized quality, reliability, and customer satisfaction. We're proud to partner with businesses across various industries, helping them streamline operations and enhance their bottom line.
about.missionText1: We are shaping the future of the catering industry ‚Äì with innovative food vending machines that combine quality, sustainability, and convenience. Our goal is to offer real alternatives: to combat staff shortages, rising costs, and rigid opening hours. We create solutions that provide people with good food around the clock ‚Äì flexibly, efficiently, and at the highest quality.
about.visionText1: We envision a world in which healthy, high-quality food is available anytime, anywhere ‚Äì digitally networked, sustainably produced, and intuitively usable. With our vending machine solutions, we want to be leaders in a new era of catering that unites people, technology, and responsibility.

privacypolicy.introductionText: New Age of Food (‚Äúwe,‚Äù ‚Äúus,‚Äù or ‚Äúour‚Äù) is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and share information when you use our website https://www.vendinaf.com
privacypolicy.personalInfotext: Information that identifies you, such as your name, email address, phone number, and postal address. We collect this information when you:
privacypolicy.personalInfoList1: Create an account on our Site
privacypolicy.logDatatext: Information that is automatically collected when you access and use our Site, such as your IP address, browser type, operating system, referring URLs, pages visited, and the dates/times of your visits.
privacypolicy.cookiesText: We use cookies and similar technologies to collect information about your browsing activity on our Site. Cookies are small data files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. We use cookies to:
privacypolicy.membershipCardtext: For membership card holders, we collect information related to your card number and purchase history.
privacypolicy.clientAccounttext: For our business clients, we collect information related to usernames, passwords, and usage data.
privacypolicy.legalBasistext: We will only process your personal information where we have a legal basis to do so. This includes:
privacypolicy.legalBasisList2: The performance of a contract with you (e.g., to process your orders)
privacypolicy.legalBasisList4: Our legitimate interests (e.g., to improve our Site and services), provided that your interests and fundamental rights do not override those interests.
privacypolicy.shareInfoText: We may share your information with the following third parties:
privacypolicy.shareInfoList1text: We share information with third-party service providers who assist us with website hosting, payment processing, email marketing, data analytics, and other services. We have contracts with these service providers that require them to protect your information.
privacypolicy.shareInfoList2text: We may share information with our business partners to offer you products or services that may be of interest to you. (We will only do this with your consent.)
privacypolicy.shareInfoList3text: We may disclose your information to legal authorities if required by law or legal process.
privacypolicy.choicesText: You have the following choices regarding your information:
privacypolicy.choicesList1text: You have the right to access and correct your personal information.
privacypolicy.choicesList2text: You can opt-out of receiving marketing communications from us at any time.
privacypolicy.choicesList3text: You can control cookies through your browser settings.
privacypolicy.choicesList4Bold: Right to Erasure ("Right to be Forgotten"):
privacypolicy.choicesList4text: You have the right to request that we erase your personal information under certain circumstances.
privacypolicy.choicesList5text: You have the right to restrict the processing of your personal information under certain circumstances.
privacypolicy.choicesList6text: You have the right to receive your personal information in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format and to transmit that data to another controller.
privacypolicy.choicesList7text: You have the right to object to the processing of your personal information under certain circumstances.
privacypolicy.choicesList8text: If we are processing your personal information based on your consent, you have the right to withdraw your consent at any time.
privacypolicy.securityText: We take reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage, is 100% secure.
privacypolicy.retentionText: We will retain your information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. For example, we retain contact details for 6 months for tax and accounting purposes. We retain email addresses for newsletter subscribers until they unsubscribe.
privacypolicy.childrenText: Our Site is not directed to children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect any personal information from children under the age of 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.
privacypolicy.linksText: Our Site may contain links to other websites that are not owned or controlled by us. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these other websites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any website you visit.
privacypolicy.transfersText: If you are accessing our Site from outside of Germany, your information may be transferred to and stored in Germany, where our servers are located. To ensure that your personal information is protected when transferred outside the European Economic Area (EEA), we rely on Standard Contractual Clauses approved by the European Commission with our service providers. You can request a copy of these clauses by contacting us.
privacypolicy.gdprText: If you are a resident of the European Economic Area (EEA), you have certain rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). These rights include:
privacypolicy.gdprList1text: You have the right to access and correct your personal information. You can do this by logging into your account on our Site or by contacting us directly.
privacypolicy.gdprList2text: You can opt-out of receiving marketing communications from us by clicking the "unsubscribe" link in our emails or by contacting us directly.
privacypolicy.gdprList3text: You can control cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling cookies may affect your ability to use certain features of our Site.
privacypolicy.gdprList4Bold: Right to Erasure ("Right to be Forgotten"):
privacypolicy.gdprList4text: You have the right to request that we erase your personal information under certain circumstances.
privacypolicy.gdprList5text: You have the right to restrict the processing of your personal information under certain circumstances.
privacypolicy.gdprList6text: You have the right to receive your personal information in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format and to transmit that data to another controller.
privacypolicy.gdprList7text: You have the right to object to the processing of your personal information under certain circumstances.
privacypolicy.gdprList8text: If we are processing your personal information based on your consent, you have the right to withdraw your consent at any time.
privacypolicy.controllerText: New Age of Food is the data controller responsible for the processing of your personal information.
privacypolicy.changesText: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will post any changes on our Site. Your continued use of our Site after the posting of changes constitutes your acceptance of the revised Privacy Policy.
privacypolicy.contactText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

footer.subscrptionText: We deliver innovative Vending with seamless tech and design. Subscribe to learn how.

faqs.answer1: NAF stands for "New Age of Food" ‚Äì an innovative food and supply concept that combines vending machines, sustainable reusable packaging, smart software solutions, and intelligent sales strategies.
faqs.question2: What is the goal of NAF?
faqs.answer2: Our goal is to rethink gastronomy: 24/7 catering without staff shortages, innovative vending machine solutions, healthy meals, and a financially attractive option for businesses, hotels, public institutions, and more.
faqs.answer3: NAF was founded by Abdelilah Lamkhizni ‚Äì with many years of experience in gastronomy, hospitality, and technology. The company combines culinary expertise with digital solutions.
faqs.question4: What is NAF and what vending machines do you offer?
faqs.answer4: NAF stands for "New Age of Food" and offers a digital, innovative solution for the food service industry. Our vending machines serve fresh, high-quality meals around the clock ‚Äì without the need for staff. We offer:
faqs.list9: Catering machines for hotels, factories, gas stations, schools, etc.
faqs.answer4_2: Each machine is equipped with state-of-the-art technology and can be customized.
faqs.answer5: Our machines feature smart control systems and can be operated contactlessly via card, app, or voucher. Depending on the machine type, meals are served fresh, stored frozen and reheated, or freshly prepared.
faqs.list10: Standard: With NAF logo, free of charge
faqs.question8: Is a digital menu display possible?
faqs.question9: What reusable solutions does NAF offer?
faqs.answer9: We rely on a sustainable system with reusable containers and return machines.
faqs.question10: How does the return machine work?
faqs.answer10: Customers scan a QR code and return the container. The deposit is refunded automatically via customer card or app.
faqs.question11: Are there subsidies for return machines?
faqs.question12: What does the NAF Cloud System offer?
faqs.answer13: Not yet ‚Äì but an app is in development to enable purchases, coupons, feedback, returns, and payments.
faqs.answer14: Multilingual support is integrated ‚Äì ideal for hotels, gas stations, or international customers.
